packages.description: A list of URLs and/or filepaths to packages. Returns the entirety of the contents of the package. If the package contains a plugin file, the contents of the file are not returned as they are just WASM bytes.

description.description: A short description of the purpose of this package and what it contains. Should be LLM-friendly. Supports markdown.

path.description:
The path to the file relative to the root of the registry. The root of the registry is the directory housing your 'registry.json' file. Cannot be outside of the registry root.
 If the type is set to "plugin", this path must be to a WASM binary or a Go file (which will be compiled to WASM).

source.description: The source for the contents of the file. This does not need to be set manually as it's populated by the "skiff build" command.

path.description:
The contents of the file can be found at another path. Supports both HTTP(S), relative, and absolute unix file paths.
 If the path is relative, it is relative to the registry.json file.

text.description: The text contents of the file. This field will be populated if the file contains valid UTF-8 text.

source.title: Source

target.description: The target path of the file relative to the root of the project. Accepts template parameters.

type.description: The type of the file. Defaults to file.
type.title: Type

name.description: The name of the package. This should be unique between all packages within a registry.

schema.description: If a field does not have a default, it is marked as required.

default.description: The default value. If set, the field will be marked as optional. If the enum field is set, this field must be one of the enum values.
default.title: Value

description.description: A short description of the field. This is highly recommended to provide context to all consumers of your package.

enum.description: Restrict your options to a set of values to choose.
enum.title: List Value

items.description: If the type is set to "array", this specifies the underlying type. Required if type is "array".

enum.description: Restrict your options to a set of values to choose.
enum.title: List Value

type.description: Required. Can be a string or number.
type.title: Type

items.title: Sub Field

name.description: The name of the field. This must be unique between all fields.

type.description: The expected type of the field.
type.title: Type
